General.Name: OSX Brasil S.A
General.Description: OSX Brasil S.A. operates in the development of its port and industrial complex. It handles various cargoes, such as oil, iron ore, project, bauxite, coke, and coal cargoes. The company was formerly known as EBX Brasil S.A. and changed its name to OSX Brasil S.A. in October 2009. OSX Brasil S.A. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Lauro Müller, no 116, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 22290-906
